descripcion:
• 7- Operations Manager (Gerente Operaciones) (1)

    Main Objectives

    • Serve clients by planning and implementing call center strategies and operations, improving systems, processes and managing staff.

    • Determine call center operational strategies by conducting, performance reviews, capacity planning, defining user requirements; evaluate productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; contributing information and analysis to organizational strategic plans and reviews.

    Requirements

    • Advanced/Native English

    • Proven experience IN similar positions

    • Open availability

    • Experience in customer service/service in call centers

    • Knowledge of performance evaluation and customer service metrics

    • Solid understanding of reporting and budgeting procedures

    • Proficient in Office and call center equipment/software programs

    • Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills

    • Excellent organizational and leadership skills with a problem-solving ability

    • Leadership, Integrity, and confidentiality.

    • Excellent organizational and time-management skills.

    • Availability to travel to the USA for training. US visa available will be a plus.

    Great Benefits and Competitive Salary. Looking to Hire ASAP.
